enb_long_title: Tenth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Although the negotiations at COP-10 have struggled to come up with provisions on future commitments, high-level statements demonstrate that governments are indeed reflecting seriously about the next commitment period and future actions.
Observers remarked that, while the day seemed quiet, a highly charged 'Friends of the President' group was milling over the bracketed draft decisions in a sheltered room upstairs in La Rural.
This group is also discussing the contested seminars on future actions, and are expected to come with a 'package' deal to the COP on Friday.
